summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 5, University Heights Addition, being the alley between University Way and Brooklyn Avenue, from East 52nd Street to East 55th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 108935 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
